projects.title: Resume Maker App
projects.description: Utilized React's state management to handle CRUD operations for resumes. Users can create new resumes, edit, update, and delete resumes.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Ensured the portfolio is fully responsive and adapts to various screen sizes, providing an optimal experience on both desktop and mobile devices.

projects.title: Image Searching
projects.description: Enabled users to search for images by entering keywords. Integrated with an image search API to retrieve and display relevant results.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: A fully responsive Netflix clone that replicates the user interface and basic functionalities of the popular streaming service. The project was built using React.js.
